JD-Xi Editor
  • API Reference
  • filter
  • View page source

filter

This widget provides a user interface for controlling Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) parameters, with a graphical plot to visualize the modulation envelope. It includes controls for pulse width and modulation depth, and can communicate with MIDI devices.

Classes

FilterWidget

Base class for envelope widgets in the JD-Xi editor

Module Contents

class filter.FilterWidget(cutoff_param: jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.AddressParameter, slope_param: jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.AddressParameter = None, midi_helper: jdxi_editor.midi.io.helper.MidiIOHelper | None = None, controls: dict[jdxi_editor.midi.data.parameter.AddressParameter, PySide6.QtWidgets.QWidget] = None, address: jdxi_editor.midi.data.address.address.RolandSysExAddress | None = None, create_parameter_slider: Callable = None, create_parameter_switch: Callable = None, parent: PySide6.QtWidgets.QWidget | None = None)[source]
